scripts.generate:client:edge: npm run remove:src:dirs && openapi-generator-cli generate -g r -o . -i https://sage-bionetworks.github.io/rocc-schemas/edge/openapi.json -c client/config.yaml
scripts.generate:client:latest: npm run remove:src:dirs && openapi-generator-cli generate -g r -o . -i https://sage-bionetworks.github.io/rocc-schemas/latest/openapi.json -c client/config.yaml
scripts.generate:client:version: npm run remove:src:dirs && openapi-generator-cli generate -g r -o . -i https://sage-bionetworks.github.io/rocc-schemas/${npm_config_schemas_version}/openapi.json -c client/config.yaml
